content.prompt: A car goes from rest to 30 m/s in 12 s with constant acceleration. How long does it take the car to go from rest to 15 m/s with the same acceleration?

choices.label: 12 / 2   s MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C3C@

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
